name: webfer/custom_bootstrap_icon_font
description: Drupal module that generates a custom WOFF2 icon font from a selected subset of Bootstrap Icons and publishes matching CSS classes.

suggest.drush/drush: Required to run the build command (drush di-font:build).
suggest.npm:fantasticon: Required to generate the font assets; install via npm (e.g. `npm i -D fantasticon`) and use `npx fantasticon` (or set generator_command accordingly).
